title: Pain, suffering, countries that are weak
author: VD
content_html:
In the words of Chuck D… here we go again:

Germany will on Wednesday adopt the most radical restructuring of its military since 1945, turning the Bundeswehr into an international intervention force, according to an internal cabinet strategy paper obtained by the Financial Times.

Deutschland, Deutschland uber alles
Uber alles in der Welt.
Einigkeit und Recht und Ordnung
Ist unsere Bewilligung!


Jetzt gibt es die neue Wehrmacht
Waffen alles schmuckt mit Blumen.
Hilf zu bringen, Lied’ zu singen
Immer wieder Tod des Juden!

Yeah, this sounds like a really freaking brilliant idea. I mean, that’s the real problem with the European Union, isn’t it… not enough armed Germans with a mandate for international intervention. I can’t wait to hear what sort of innocuous-sounding reason for the return of the Hakenkreuz they’re going to come up with.
